content: oh i solved it, rustc passes slices as pairs only on rustcall, not on other call convs, so it was trying to pass it indirectly, and i have something which sanity-checked that rustc was passing slices as pairs and if not, it set the mode to Pair, but without ArgAttributes. So it turns out i actually need to always apply that conversion to Pair as well as apply the arg attributes
sorry to bother :upside_down:
Riccardo D'Ambrosio has marked this topic as resolved.
